scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Visual Materials series contains photographs from various meetings and convenetions of the Academy at numerous universities across Kentucky, as well as other locations. Sub-series include: Kentucky Junior Academy of Science Science Fair Photos; Experiment and Exhibit Photos; Meeting at the University of Louisville; Meeting at Morehead State University; Meeting at the Radison Plaza Hotel in Lexington, Kentucky; Meeting at Eastern Kentucky University; Meeting at the University of Kentucky; Annual Meeting of the American Association for the Advancement of Science in New Orleans, Louisiana; and Innovative Applications of Constructed Wetlands Symposium in Lexington, Kentucky. Photographs cover a range of subjects including: Academy members, speeches, exhibits, experiments, and scenery. There are also some photo negatives and slides used during a presentation at the 74th Annual Meeting in 1988.
